member.name: T:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier
member.summary: The EmailNotifier is an action adapter which takes multiple input measurements and defines a boolean expression such that when the expression is true an e-mail is triggered.

member.name: F:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.DefaultImports
member.summary: Defines the default value for property.

member.name: M:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the .

member.summary: Gets or sets the textual representation of the boolean expression.

member.summary: Gets or sets the list of variables used in the expression.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Imports
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of types which define methods to be imported into the expression parser.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the message sender.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.ToRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message recipients.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.CcRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message carbon copy (CC) recipients.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.BccRecipients
member.summary: Gets or sets the comma-separated or semicolon-separated e-mail address list of the message blank carbon copy (BCC) recipients.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject of the message.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Body
member.summary: Gets or sets the body of the message.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.SmtpServer
member.summary: Gets or sets the name or IP address of the SMTP server to be used for sending the message.
member.exception: Value being assigned is a null or empty string.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.IsBodyHtml
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicating whether the message body is to be formatted as HTML.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Username
member.summary: Gets or sets the username used to authenticate to the SMTP server.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password used to authenticate to the SMTP server.

member.name: P:DynamicCalculator.EmailNotifier.EnableSSL
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag that determines whether to use SSL when communicating with the SMTP server.

member.summary: Gets the flag indicating if this adapter supports temporal processing.
